translation:
n. 循环，周期; 自行车; 时代，一段时间; 整套
vi. 周而复始，循环; 骑自行车; 轮转
vt. 运转，循环; 使轮转

时态：cycled, cycling, cycles
分布：周期(54%)，循环(35%)，自行车(6%)，骑自行车(4%)，摩托车(1%)


→来自kwel, 弯，转。词源同colony, culture, pole.
周期[circ,cycl=ring,circle,表示"圆,环"]
n.自行车;周期,循环v.骑自行车;循环He cycles to school every day.他每天骑车上学.



noun BICYCLE  单车／脚踏车／自行车   IMPROVER  countable ■a bicycle 单车，脚踏车，自行车
['saɪ.kl] noun SERIES  连续  countable ■a group of events which happen in a particular order, one following the other, and which are often repeated 循环；周期
•the life cycle of a moth蛾的生命周期
countable ■one in a series of movements that a machine performs （机器的）工作周期，工作程式
•the spin cycle脱水程序

['saɪ.kl] noun PLAYS/POEMS  戏剧／诗歌  countable [+ sing/pl verb] ■a group of plays, poems, etc. written by one person and connected with each other by dealing with the same characters or ideas （表现相同人物或思想的）全套剧目，组诗
•It's one in a cycle of plays that are being performed on successive evenings.这几部连台戏连续几晚都在上演，这只是其中一部。

['saɪ.kl] verb intransitive ■to ride a bicycle 骑单车／脚踏车



n. 循环；周期； [车辆] 自行车；整套；一段时间
 - circle, revolution, rotation, round, bike
vt. 使循环；使轮转
 - circulate
vi. 循环； [车辆] 骑自行车；轮转
 - circumrotate, ride a bike
examples: 英 ['saɪkl] 美 ['saɪkl]
n.循环；周期；自行车；摩托车v.骑自行车；(使)轮转；(使)循环

(1) The seasons of the year make a cycle.(2) The business cycle experienced a sudden down.(3) A cycle of the sun takes a year.(4) I go to school by cycle every day.(5) There are thousands of cycle paths in Holland.(6) Her latest stunt is riding a motor cycle through a ring of flames.(7) I usually cycle home through the park.(8) It's easier to cycle with the wind behind you.(9) This machine automatically cycles.(10) You can press TAB to cycle through the windows.
(1) 一年四季构成一个循环。(2) 商业周期经历了突然的萧条。(3) 太阳循环周期需要一年。(4) 我每天骑自行车上学。(5) 荷兰有数千条自行车道。(6) 她的最新特技表演是骑摩托车钻火圈。(7) 我通常骑自行车穿过公园回家。(8) 顺风骑车省力。(9) 这台机器能够自动轮转。(10) 你可以按Tab键循环切换窗口。

translation:
vt. 构成，组成; 制定，设立; 等同于; 指派

时态：constituted, constituting, constitutes
分布：构成(70%)，组成(19%)，制定(4%)，建立(4%)，任命(3%)


→con-, 强调。-stit, 站，词源同stand, institute. 即站立其中的，构成其中一部分的。
构成;制定(con一起+stitute→放到一起→构成)[atitut,stit=setup,place,表示"建立,放"]
vt.组成,构成,形成;设立,建立,任命Trivial tributes constitute the attribute of constituent's report.琐屑的颂词形成选民的报告的属性.
【记】con一起，stitute建立－建立到一起－构成【反】abdicate（v 退位；放弃（职位，权力等））



US ['kɑ:n.stɪ.tu:t] verb BE CONSIDERED AS  被视作   ADVANCED  [L only + noun] [not continuous] formal ■to be or be considered as something 是；被看作，被视为
•This latest defeat constitutes a major setback for the government.最近的这次失败是对政府的一次重挫。

UK ['kɒn.stɪ.tju:t] US ['kɑ:n.stɪ.tu:t] verb FORM PART OF  构成  [L not continuous] ■to form or make something 形成；构成；组成
•Women constitute about 10% of Parliament.女性在议会中约占10%。

•The under-18s constitute nearly 25% of the town's population.18岁以下的人口占该城镇人口的近25%。





constitute, cover, consist, contain, involve, compose

constitute: 制定，设立，任命
cover: 覆盖，涉及
consist: 在于，存在于
contain: 包含，强调包容关系，既可指具体有形的东西，也可指抽象无形的东西
involve: 包含，所包括的往往是无形的，不可触知的东西，多用作引申
compose: 创作（乐曲、诗歌等）



constitute, consist, compose, comprise, include

这组词都有“组成，包含”的意思，其区别是：
constitute: v.构成，组成(整体)。
 • Crime and illegal drugs constitute the city's major problems.   犯罪和非法毒品买卖是这个城市面临的主要问题。
consist: v.组成，构成,由……组成(后接of，常用于主动语态)；(后接in)在于，存在于。
 • The problem consists of two parts.   问题由两部分组成。
 • The beauty of the plan consists in its simplicity.   这计划的好处就在于简单易行。
compose: v.构成(整体)，组成；由……组成(后接of，常用于被动语态)；创作(作曲、诗歌等)。
 • The committee was composed mainly of teachers and parents.   委员会主要由教师和学生家长组成。
comprise: v.包含，包括，由……组成(整体)；组成，构成。
 • Our company's product line comprises 2,500 different items.   我们公司的生产线是由2,500个不同的组成部分构成的。
include: v.包括，包含，把……列入。
 • The conference delegates included representatives from abroad.   大会代表中有来自海外的代表。


vt. 组成，构成；建立；任命
 - install, establish, form, found, build
examples: 英 ['kɒnstɪtjuːt] 美 ['kɑːnstətuːt]
vt.构成；组成；任命；建立；制定

(1) Twelve months constitute one year.(2) Correct grammar and sentence structure do not in themselves constitute good writing.(3) The committee is constituted of members of all three parties.(4) He was constituted representative of the party.(5) Laws are constituted to protect individual rights and properties.
(1) 十二个月构成一年。(2) 正确的语法和句子结构本身并不能构成一篇好文章。(3) 委员会由所有三个政党的成员组成。(4) 他被任命为该党的代表。(5) 法律是为保卫人民的权利和财产而制定的。
